Name: Tropical Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A seriously tangy Daiquiri that's best made with a well-aged Jamaican rum that has a touch of funk.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David Embury's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Tropical Daiquiri contains 184 calories
